Dated this the 8" day of January, 2018
ORDER

Petitioners are the accused in CC No.348/2012 of
the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which
has arisen from Crime No.56/2012 of Chandera Police
Station for the offences punishable under Sections 341,
323, 324, 506(i) and 355 read with Section 34 IPC.

2. It seems that the matter has been amicably
settled between the petitioners and the de_ facto
complainant, who is the 2"? respondent herein.

3. The 2â„¢ respondent has filed Annexure-A3
affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled
between him and the petitioners and presently, he has no
complaints against the petitioners. When the matter is
settled between the parties, no purpose would be served in
proceeding with the matter further. Matters being so, all

the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, Hosdurg, which
has arisen from Crime No.56/2012 of Chandera Police
Station, are quashed.
